document.full_text: the owners of the minnesota vikings said tuesday the team's future is in the suburbs, announcing a deal with ramsey county to collaborate on a $1.1 billion retractable-roof football stadium about 10 miles north of their current home at the metrodome in downtown minneapolis.
document.title: twin cities suburb pitches new vikings stadium
lines_and_colors: the owners of the minnesota vikings said tuesday the team's future is in the suburbs, announcing a deal with ramsey county to collaborate on a $1.1 billion retractable-roof football stadium about 10 miles north of their current home at the metrodome in downtown minneapolis.
